original_title: Three teachers arrested for assaulting 19-year-old schoolboy
original_body_lines: Three male teachers have been arrested for assaulting a 19-year-old student inside a school in Maha Oya, Police said.
The teachers were arrested following a complaint lodged by the boy's mother claiming that her child was admitted to the Maya Oya hospital after being assaulted by several teachers in the school.
The arrested suspects aged 34, 37 and 43 are residents of Maha Oya and Padiyathalawa.
They are to be produced before the Dehiattakandiya Magistrate's Court today.
